original_text: And with great power the apostles were giving their testimony to the resurrection of the Lord Jesus, and great grace was upon them all.
korean_text: 사도들이 큰 권능으로 주 예수의 부활을 증언하니 무리가 큰 은혜를 받아

sentences.original_text: the apostles were giving their testimony
to the resurrection of the Lord Jesus
and great grace was upon them all.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 큰 은혜가 그들 모두에게 임했습니다
